Introduction
This topic contains information on claims based on participation in Project SHAD, including
background on Project SHAD
considering service connection (SC) based on SHAD participation
, and
Project SHAD rating requirements
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Based on Participation in Project Shipboard Hazard and Defense (SHAD)
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 6, Section B
